service.title: Lovely walk on Sea point promanade
service.overview: Does your dog love walks on the beach? Then she/he will love this service! I will take your lovely dog on a walk around the Seapoint promenade (about 2 km). I will adapt to the peace of your dog and return when I see they get too tired. The total time this should take is about 1 hour and I will only charge you for only 1 hour even if it does take a little longer. I will also constantly send updates annd pictures :).
service.reviews: WARNING: Not sure what this looks like yet.
